scripts.deploy:report: git add allure-report && git commit -m 'Upload report' && git push origin `git subtree split --prefix allure-report main`:gh-pages --force
scripts.test: npm run clean:allure && npx wdio wdio.conf.js && npm run generate:allure && npm run open:allure
scripts.test:deploy:email: npm run clean:allure && npx wdio wdio.conf.js && npm run generate:allure && npm run deploy:report && npm run send:email
